CustomField.description: Contains the scheduling strategy value to be used when moving project task dates. When blank, schedules respect the auto-recalculate-schedule-for-assignments configuration option, if it is set to true. The valid values are Retain Past Schedules, Retain Schedule Adjustments. The default value is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a scheduling strategy to use when moving project task dates. When blank, schedules respect the auto-recalculate-schedule-for-assignments configuration option, if it is set to true. The valid values are Retain Past Schedules, Retain Schedule Adjustments.
CustomField.label: Project Task Scheduling
